lead_paragraph: An appeals committee yesterday unanimously overturned the $10,000 fine levied against a crew chief for Kyle Busch after a Busch Series race in Kansas.The crew chief, Michael Bumgarner, was fined after Busch’s win at Kansas Speedway last month because Nascar said the intake manifold on the Chevrolet did not conform to its standards. Hendrick Motorsports argued that the part, and others identical to it, had been used over the last three seasons and never failed inspection.
